title: For Trade T206 Hall of Famers For Turkey Red's

posts.post_title: For Trade T206 Hall of Famers For Turkey Red's
posts.post_content:
Posted By: CobbTigers
I have a few T-206 HOFER's in PSA-4 and SGC-50 plus Cash that I would like to trade for a like condition Turkey Red HOFER (I would also consider one in PSA-3, SGC-40=3. I have a Mcgraw PSA-4(Glove at hip) Sweet Caporal Fact.42 Overprint back, Chance Yellow Port SGC-50(Old Mill) back, Collins (Gai 4.5)Piedmont 350 back,Evers PSA-4 (Green Port)Piedmont 150 back etc. Please e-mail for list or details if intrested. Thanks for looking. Dennis.
